"mokak ganada oya kiyanna hadanne?"haduma atharin aya asuwaya."dedunu oya porondu wenna hitha narak karaganna kiyala."pabo kiwaya."hari man porondu wennam oya kiyannako."aa kiwaya."kumara aawe oya gana ahanna"pabo kiyannata wiya."man gana?"aa puduma wuwaya."ow amma kamathi wuna.eya kiyapu dewal mama kiyanna oona nane""amma kohomada ehema karanne mama kohomada ee amunushyath ekka jiwath wenne?"age haduma wadi wiya."dedunu kaganna epa.oya dannawane mama katha karanna kiyala.eyala aawoth mata mona weyida?"pabo biyen thelapuwaya."samawenna.pabo eeth mama daraganne kohomada?"dedunu kadulu piri his balmak heluwaya."oya mata porondu wuna hitha kalabala karaganna kiyala.""hari man amata katha karala ennam""oya kadulu pihidan yanna"pabo kiwaya.dedunu yana athara pabo mese sithannata wiya.me kellata kochchara nam duk widinna wenawada?eeth eyata mama kohomada kiyanne eyage aththa demapiyo gana...pabo susumakin laya sahallu kara gaththaya.dedunu ama ha welata aawaya."ama me welawe karadara kalata samawenna oona.eeth mama watila inna thathwe gana mata oyata kiyanna oona."aa kiwaya."mokakda dedunu prashne"prashnaya barapathala bawa iwen men wataha gath ama asuwaya."mekayi......"aa thama prashnaya ama idiriye diga hariyaya."dedunu oyalage ammata hithak papuwak nadda?me wage aparadhayak karanna tharam"ama kopa wuwaya."mama danna ama.mata mona weyida kiyala.mata welawakata hithenawa eyala mage demapiyo neweyi kiyala.pabo witharayi mata aadare karanne.oyayi paboyi naththam ada mata mona weyida danna"dedunu kalakiri sitiyaya."asubha katha kiyannepa dedunu..api hamadamath umbaata innawa kiyala mathaka thiya ganin"ama dukin kiwaya."mama dannawa..eeth mona karannada manda ama .mama dan gedara yannam""oya oya gana wadiya kalpana nokara kaleta ida denna""hodayi mama yannam" dedunu niwasata ennata wiya.padam potha athata gaththath hitha awul nisa ayata kisiwak hithata aawe natha.rathri kama pisu aya nidanta giyath ninda aa soya aawe natha.ekwarama age sihiyata aawe yohan ha akilayi.ee denna kochchara hodada kumarata wada.ee wage aya aduraganna labenawanam kochchara hodada?ayata pahala wuna sithuwilla wiya. 4.kotasa "oya hari dakshayine..."
